messages.message: @shiqi would it be possible to install the language-pack-en-package on the linux builder vm by running `locale-gen en_US.UTF-8` and `update-locale LANG=en_US.UTF-8`?
@Kathy Wu would you be able to update the CI pipeline to run those commands to give it a try?
for sure, let me try that

I updated the `tools/releasetools/jenkins/pipelines/ci-tests.groovy` file with the commands, but I'm not sure how to run the new pipeline on jenkins. Is there a way to rebuild the CI pipeline with my changes?

hm it doesn't recognize the `locale-gen` command. I also tried installing locales first with `apt-get clean && apt-get update && apt-get install -y locales`, but ran into a permissions error with apt-get
OK let me take a look
@Kathy Wu is that command supposed to be on the machine or in the docker?
if the build is in the machine, I think the machine? we can try the commands in docker though
the build is in the machine but that traceback looks like happens within the docker, can you try running those commands in the docker and see if that works
